author: National Bureau
text:
Former Delhi police chief Y S. Dadwal, one of the two advisers to the Arunachal Pradesh governor J.P. Rajkhowa, resigned on Tuesday citing “personal reasons.” Mr. Dadwal will be replaced by B.D. Sharma, former Director General of Sashastra Seema Bal (SSB).

Arunachal Pradesh came under President’s rule on January 26 and the Union Home Ministry appointed G.S. Patnaik and Mr. Dadwal advisers.
title: Governor’s adviser quits
